game.name: Dark Grid
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You wake up with only a luminous tower beside you, its warm light enveloping you. Besides, looking around, there is only endless darkness. Survival, exploration, utilizing all resources around to survive, searching for the reasons why the world is plunged into darkness.
